title: Over the River, Project for the Arkansas River, Colorado [top panel]
medium: top panel of two parts: collage with drawn topographic contour map, pastel, wax crayon, graphite, and tape on wove paper
dimensions:
Overall: 37.7 x 164.8 cm (14 13/16 x 64 7/8 in.)

creditline: Gift of a Private Collector in honor of Dorothy and Herbert Vogel
